item.title: Breaking Into Data Science I: Plan of Attack
item.description: Over the years, I’ve developed an effective system for accomplishing long-term goals such as learning a language, mastering a musical instrument, transitioning fields to a new discipline, and integrating exercise into one’s life as a regular habit. The first step of this system relies on answering two questions that will become the compass for setting each of several tiny micro-goals. Your wants must be transformed into actionable items, from abstract concepts into concrete objectives.
